function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor quality housing as a significant source of indoor pollutants","Impact":"Increased risk of physical and mental illness, potential for disability and loss of life","Mitigation":"Improving housing quality, addressing indoor pollutants, and providing better living conditions","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and building insulation","People":"Low-income households, children, and inhabitants exposed to indoor pollutants","Owner":"Government, housing authorities, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Disruption of individual lifestyles and society's priorities due to COVID-19 lockdowns","Impact":"Mental and physical health issues, economic recession, increased underconsumption and poverty","Mitigation":"Developing support systems for mental health, addressing economic challenges, and promoting social interaction","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote work technology, and online mental health resources","People":"Individuals, families, and communities affected by the lockdowns","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and community support groups"},{"Description":"Social isolation leading to adverse effects on mental and physical health","Impact":"Increased risk of mental illness, reduced physical activity, and potential for long-term health issues","Mitigation":"Promoting social interaction, providing mental health support, and encouraging physical activity","Technologies":"Social media platforms, online support groups, and telehealth services","People":"Individuals experiencing social isolation, vulnerable populations, and those with limited support networks","Owner":"Community organizations, mental health professionals, and social service providers"}]}
